situation.title: Halls of residence
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for students living in dormitories.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Because of the current epidemiological situation, it is not allowed for school accommodation facilities to offer accommodation to students who have another residence in the Czech republic. This also applies to university students.

There are some exceptions, which apply for example to students who are going through practical education in medical and pedagogical fields or students on work duty.

I have a residence in a dormitory

Students without residence in the Czech Republic are allowed to stay in student housing. If a residence is a place where you intend to live or it is a place where you feel at home. In this case hand in a declaration to your university so you can stay living there. 

If you stay in your dormitory, follow hygienic regulations- wear a facemask, disinfect your hands, and practice social distancing.

The Ministry of Education asks students who have the possibility to return home do so to limit their social contacts.

Universities regulate the operation of dormitories on their own. If you have any questions, please contact the dormitory operator. If you are at risk of a difficult financial situation in relation to these regulations, reach out to your university, since they can offer you a social scholarship. Financial assistance is also offered by the Ministry of Labour and Social Affairs.

questions_answers.question: Can I stay at my dormitory if I have a residence in Slovakia?
questions_answers.value: Yes, the condition is residence in the Czech Republic.

questions_answers.question: Is a residence the same thing as a permanent residence?
questions_answers.value: They can be the same place, but they don't have to be. Your permanent residence is your official address but your residence is decided by where you feel at home. For example, if your official residence is in Most, but you live, study and have friends in Prague, your residence can be in Prague.

questions_answers.question: Who decides about university dormitories being open?
questions_answers.value: The school itself, this decision does not fall under the Ministry of Education.

questions_answers.question: Under what conditions can I stay at my dormitory?
questions_answers.value: If you don't have another residence in the Czech republic which you can prove by a declaration.
